objective: Economic impact of AI on healthcare

sub_tasks.task: Investigate how AI reduces healthcare costs through automation and efficiency improvements.
Analyze the impact of AI on healthcare workforce dynamics, including job displacement and creation.
Examine the cost-effectiveness of AI-driven diagnostic tools and their impact on patient outcomes.
Explore AI's role in personalized medicine and its economic implications for treatment plans.
Assess the initial investment and ongoing costs associated with integrating AI into healthcare systems.
Study the effect of AI on healthcare accessibility and its potential economic benefits for underserved populations.
Evaluate the regulatory and ethical challenges of AI in healthcare and their economic impact.
Analyze case studies of AI implementation in healthcare to identify economic trends and outcomes.
Investigate the role of AI in drug discovery and development and its impact on pharmaceutical economics.
Examine the influence of AI on healthcare data management and its economic implications.
